Key: (I wonder where Arusu went...)

Come to think of it, I did bump into her in a
weird place at night last time.
Hmmm, maybe I can look for her over there.
Oh?
Hey, Arusu!
Oh, you've come. Good evening, Shido Itsuka.

"Don't "good evening" me. You disappeared all of a
sudden, so I got worried. What are you doing here
alone? It's dangerous."

I see, I see... So this is the kind of person
you are.
Hm? What are you talking about?

Nothing. Don't mind me. I just thought you
had an interesting mindset. That's all.

(She's different than usual. She was like this
last night, too.)

What were you doing here? Everyone's worried.
Let's go back.

What was I doing...? Hmm... I was watching you,
Shido Itsuka. I mean, that's what I'm here for.

But I just got here. What are you doing alone in
the park?

Hehe... You see, I know everything about this
world. You understand, don't you?
Come to think of it... you're right.
Hey. Do you know why I've been watching you?

Because... you want to know what love is?
You said you can figure it out by observing me...
I personally don't get it.
To know what love is, huh...? I see, I see.

What? You were the one who told me that. That
you'd stick by me until you understood what it
was.

Ah, I did, didn't I? But Shido Itsuka, do you know
what that means?

You're acting strange... I know I've asked you
before, but... You're Arusu, right?

Yeah, and I've answered. I told you I am, but that
I'm not... I guess.

But yesterday you said you were Arusu. What...
do you mean?
I wonder...?
So is it your... other personality...?

I won't tell you. But I think you're starting to
realize the answer for yourself.
I don't know what to say to that...

I'm Arusu. That is the only thing that has been
determined. So I would not make a mistake of it.
Ever.
Hmm... I see. Then let's just go home. It's late.
Oh, and the dessert you made—

Ah... Sorry, Shido Itsuka. There's still something
I need to do.
So... later.
H-Hey! Arusu?!
...She's gone. Where did she go?
Jeez, I have to go and find her all over again.

There you are...! Hey, Arusu! Gosh... I was
looking all over for you!
Shido Itsuka? You were looking for me?

Yeah. You just disappeared. What are you doing
here?

...I was looking at the stars. Is that appropriate
as an answer?
The stars?

Yes. I wanted to see whether they look different
from here compared to when I look at them from
your house.

Well, it'd be the same. Stars are so far away that
moving a bit shouldn't change their appearance.

If you're in another country or on the other side
of the world, it may be different.

Yes. The location of the stars was barely
different. But... other things were moving...
Hm?
...That was irrelevant. Don't worry about it.
Really? Well, I won't force you to answer me.

(I stood next to Arusu and looked up at the stars.
They did look the same as yesterday.)

...This is interesting. It feels different from
when I was looking at them on my own.

Really? Then maybe the time was different. You
know how it was late last night?
Is that what it is? ...I don't really get it.

You said earlier that you had something you needed
to do. Was this it?
What are you talking about?

(I wonder if the other Arusu's memory doesn't
transfer over to this Arusu.)
It seems like there are two of you.
What are you talking about?
Oh... nothing.
...Data states that I am Arusu. However...
However?

Arusu... This may be considered my last name.
Then that means... I may have a name... or I could
have one. I... don't get it, though.
Do you not remember your name?

Correct. Rather... I don't know whether I had one
or not.

Hmmm, you know everything about this world, yet
you don't know much about yourself... Hmm, your
name, huh?

(Maybe I can think of one like Tohka's. If it's
the date, I might feel bad and regret it later...)
How about Maria? Sorry, I just thought of it.

Your clothes kind of remind me of a nun's, so I
thought it'd be perfect... Do you not like it?
Maria... Is that... my name?

W-Well, if you don't like it, you can choose
another name! I-It just popped up in my head.
No. I want it... Maria, Maria Arusu. My... name.
Yeah... I think it suits you.

...Maria Arusu. Please call me that from now on,
Shido Itsuka.
Uh... Is Maria okay?
Yes, I don't mind.

Okay, Maria. Feel free to address everyone by
their first names. I think everyone... rather, I'd
be happy if you did.
Understood... Shido.
Okay. Then... why don't we head back now?

...I wish to look at the stars a little longer. Do
you mind?
Sure, that's fine. I'll stay with you, then.

(I looked up at the night sky. Yeah, the stars are
beautiful.)

Oh, that's right. You made bavarois for the
cook-off earlier, right?

Yes. Since there were so many dishes, I thought to
make something that would aid in digestion.

It was delicious. I was full when I started eating
it, but it made me feel better. And it tasted...
kind.
Tasted... kind...?

Yeah, it was a dish I could imagine you making.
So, for the cook-off... I chose that.
Your dessert.
You... chose me?
It was the most delicious.
You... chose me? Shido Itsuka... chose me?
Hm? It's not a problem, is it?
No... I just never imagined I would be chosen.
I see. But it really was delicious. Thanks, Maria.
No problem... This feels different.

(Maybe Arusu... I mean, Maria, is starting
to change.)
...Shido Itsuka.
Hm?
...The stars are beautiful.
Yeah, they are beautiful.
...Yes.

(For a little while longer, we continued to watch
the stars.)
